title: Looking for a ranked 5s team.
body: Hello, I am a G1 top/jg main and can play support or mid (plz don't ask me to adc). I am currently looking for a team who is not all that serious but would not screw each up unless it is for fun. I don't really care what the ranks are for the other players or the team. If anyone is interested in inviting me could you please add me in game. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Jaffer, I'm Currently Putting together a team, And Could really use a support :D so if you feel comfortable playing support in a team please get back to me in game @ Cerulean Sky.

We're pretty much a group of friends missing a bot lane, so we are pretty relaxed and friendly
